Anderson Paschoalon

C/C++/C# desktop and embedded-system developer, master and self-made researcher, machine learning enthusiast, and game modder.

Welcome to my Personal Website!





Who I'm

Hi there!

I'm Anderson Paschoalon, an desktop & embeeded-system developer.

I work mainly with C/C++/C#, and I'm also experienced in Python.

Currently I'm working with smart-card issuance technologies.

I also have worked as a Network and Telecomunication researcher, with experience on Network Stack, LTE, SDN and Network Traffic generation and modelling.

Right now my interests of studies are Deep Learning technologies and Game Development.

I also love to travel and be in touch with the nature :)

Me, and my wife, Rubia :)
Araucarias from Campos do Jordão
Pedra Redonda mount at Monte Verde
Serrinha do Alambari at Penedo
